name: Test Listing 1
description: Experience luxury living in this modern 3-bedroom apartment in Mumbai. The spacious living room opens to a balcony with breathtaking city views. The kitchen is equipped with the latest appliances, and the bedrooms are designed for comfort and relaxation. Enjoy amenities like a swimming pool, gym, and 24/7 security. Located in a prime area, this apartment offers easy access to shopping malls, restaurants, and public transport. Perfect for families or professionals seeking a blend of convenience and elegance in the heart of Mumbai.

name: Test Listing 2
description: This stunning villa in Bangalore offers a peaceful retreat with its lush private garden and sparkling swimming pool. The villa features five spacious bedrooms, a state-of-the-art kitchen, and a large living area perfect for entertaining guests. Smart home features ensure comfort and security. Located in a quiet neighborhood, it is close to top schools, tech parks, and shopping centers. Ideal for families who value privacy, luxury, and convenience in one of Bangalore's most sought-after areas.

name: Test Listing 3
description: Located in Pune's vibrant Hinjewadi area, this cozy studio apartment is perfect for young professionals or students. The open-plan design maximizes space, while large windows fill the home with natural light. The kitchen is compact yet functional, and the building offers 24/7 security and a fitness center. With easy access to IT parks, shopping, and dining, this studio combines affordability with modern living in one of Pune's most dynamic neighborhoods.

name: Test Listing 4
description: This elegant house in Delhi's South Extension offers a blend of traditional charm and modern amenities. The home features four spacious bedrooms, a large backyard perfect for gatherings, and a fully equipped modular kitchen. The home office is ideal for remote work. Located near top schools, hospitals, and shopping, this property is perfect for families seeking comfort, convenience, and a prestigious address in the capital city.

name: Test Listing 5
description: Enjoy breathtaking city views from this penthouse in Hyderabad's Banjara Hills. The property boasts luxury fittings, a private terrace, and access to a gym and clubhouse. The spacious living and dining areas are perfect for entertaining, while the bedrooms offer privacy and comfort. With top schools, hospitals, and shopping nearby, this penthouse is ideal for those seeking a premium lifestyle in Hyderabad.

name: Test Listing 6
description: This affordable studio in Chennai's T Nagar is ideal for students and young professionals. The apartment is well-ventilated, with a compact kitchen and modern bath. The building offers 24/7 security and is close to metro stations, markets, and popular eateries. Enjoy the convenience of city living at an unbeatable price in one of Chennai's most vibrant neighborhoods.

name: Test Listing 7
description: Located in Ahmedabad's Satellite area, this spacious villa features a private pool, landscaped garden, and smart home automation. The villa offers four bedrooms, a modern kitchen, and a large living area. The gated community provides security and peace of mind. Close to top schools and shopping, this home is perfect for families seeking luxury and comfort in Ahmedabad.

name: Test Listing 8
description: This modern apartment in Kolkata's Salt Lake offers river views, a fully equipped gym, and 24/7 security. The apartment features three bedrooms, a spacious living area, and a balcony. Located close to IT hubs, shopping malls, and restaurants, this property is ideal for professionals and families seeking a convenient and stylish home in Kolkata.

name: Test Listing 9
description: Discover the charm of Jaipur in this beautiful house with traditional Rajasthani architecture. The home features a spacious courtyard, rooftop terrace, and four bedrooms. The kitchen is fully equipped, and the living area is perfect for family gatherings. Located in a peaceful neighborhood, this property offers a unique blend of heritage and modern comfort.

name: Test Listing 10
description: Live in luxury in this penthouse in Gurgaon's DLF Phase 5. The property features a private elevator, home theater, and panoramic city views. The spacious living and dining areas are perfect for entertaining, while the bedrooms offer privacy and comfort. With top schools, hospitals, and shopping nearby, this penthouse is ideal for those seeking a premium lifestyle in Gurgaon.
